…Recognizing Robin Trimble on Her Retirement

Mr. KILEY of California. Mr. Speaker, I would like to recognize Robin  Trimble, who is retiring as the chief executive officer of the Rocklin  Area Chamber of Commerce, for her 20 years of dedicated service to the  Rocklin community.

For two decades, Robin has led the chamber with enthusiasm, strength,  and resilience.…
